attributes.action: resign and allow Frank Field to take over as Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Frank Field is the only politician with the guts to say what needs to be said on immigration and welfare benefits. He is also one of the very few with any integrity. Tony Blair asked him to think the unthinkable: he did and his advice was totally ignored.  He also urged the government to limit immigration:  they didn't, and seriously underestimated the problems this would cause.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
